events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday afternoon, and I am filing a claim for the damages to my vehicle and medical expenses.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the information provided about the collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to assist with your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly to gather additional details.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged by our system, and we have started the preliminary processing steps.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any medical bills related to the accident to proceed with your claim.
The requested documents including police report and medical invoices were submitted promptly by the claimant for review.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and assessing the extent of damage to the vehicle.
The investigation into the accident and the claimantâ€™s responsibilities has completed with all necessary verifications done.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and coverage terms outlined in your policy.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication received.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and our team is preparing to proceed with the payment process.
The payment for your claim has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within 3 business days.
The claim case has been closed successfully following the issuance of payment and resolution of all outstanding matters.
All records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference as per company policy.
